channel.title: Who can help me?
channel.description:
I have my variables set but i get this [URL=http://img64.imageshack.us/i/2myrg4z.png/][IMG]http://img64.imageshack.us/img64/6442/2myrg4z.png[/img][/URL]
also this is whats in my .bat [code]@echo off javac *.java pause[/code]

item.title: Who can help me?
item.dc:creator: @damien_b damien b
item.description:
@damien_b wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:7, topic:335287”]@echo off echo Started Compiling... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\Bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ./Bin/ ./*java echo Finished Compiling... pause

^ If this don’t work then copy your “Java.exe” to your Compilers root ^
^ Then it will hopefully work! ^[/quote]
started compiling
path can not be found blah blah
finish compiling
any key to continue

and can you explain the second part to me a bit more? im kind of a noob

im on windows 7 64bit if that helps any

Read full topic

item.title: Who can help me?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

@echo off echo Started Compiling... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\Bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ./Bin/ ./*java echo Finished Compiling... pause

^ If this don’t work then copy your “Java.exe” to your Compilers root ^
^ Then it will hopefully work! ^

Read full topic

item.title: Who can help me?
item.dc:creator: @damien_b damien b
item.description:
@damien_b wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:2, topic:335287”]@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit[/quote]

the path is no specified blah blah blah
Finished!(but it doesnt compile)
press any key to continue…

this is like the 12th time its happened to me

Read full topic

item.title: Who can help me?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

Read full topic
